name: Bicyclism: Art of Riding
description:
BICYCLISM EP NOW ON GREENLIGHT, VOTE HERE

Free version of the upcoming game Bicyclism EP. This version is single-player only and was made in 72 hours for a game jam.

Be a bicycle and experience the challenges and hardships that bicycles everywhere experience every day, such as jamming to Drum and Bass and penguins!

In the upcoming new version, you can expect to see things like:

  • 4 player local multiplayer
  • Rockin' soundtrack by Geminyth (https://soundcloud.com/geminyth)
  • New worlds and levels
  • New ridiculous bikes to master
  • Easier controls! Thank Jesus!
  • New game modes
  • Who knows what else!

Follow @phosphoer on Twitter for development updates on Bicyclism EP!
